author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Analyzer to analyze hits produced by a special hit producer in Geant4 and GeantV applications

#### PR validation:

Tested with privately produced files with GeantV application

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

tested with 2018 geometry configuration and no back porting is required
title: Run3-sim33 Add testing tool for Geant4/GeantV compatibility
